name: SubZer0
description:
Controls

Open menu: Q

Open shop: I

All other controls are on the top bar.

Summary:

This is the end. The planets temperature is dropping rapidly and we are in trouble. We need to do something before we are past the point of no return.

Instructions:

The aim of the game is to research technology to prevent the next ice age.

You need to manage the worlds temperature using heat generators and planetary heat sinks. You must also research the atmosphere dispersion of Co2 to fix the atmosphere.

Good luck!
